input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Downswept Douglas Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
This Downswept Douglas tree features Feel Real branch tip technology, creating a tree with remarkable realism. These crush-resistant branch tips are molded from real tree branches for an authentic living tree appearance. This tree is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy metal tree stand is included.

This Downswept Douglas Fir Full Pre-Lit Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6.5 feet tall with a 49 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of Feel Real individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and fee
Features 650 clear lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on the tree before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Downswept Douglas Fir Tree with Clear Lights 12''
  - Name='National Tree Downswept Douglas Fir Tree with Clear Lights 12''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 7.5''
  - Name='The Twillery Co. Artificial Slim Douglas Fir Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill BH Balsam Fir Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 6.5-ft. Pre-Lit Downswept Douglas Fir Pencil Slim Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 4ft. Pre-Lit Artificial White Birch Tree with 180 Warm White LED Lights'
  - Name='Balsam Hill European Fir Tree'
  - Name='Northlight 6.5' Pre-Lit Full Buffalo Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Carolina Pine Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Slim Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 7 ft.'
  - Name='Vickerman 5' x 34" Dakota Alpine Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Best Choice Products Pre-Lit Flocked Artificial Aspen Noble Fir Christmas Tree w Branch Tips'
  - Name='National Tree Company 12 Pre-lit Downswept Douglas Fir Pencil Slim Artificial Christmas Tree with Co'
  - Name='National Tree Company Majestic Fir Tree'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 8' Flocked Montana Down Swept Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree with Pinecones and 500 LED Lights'
  - Name='Best Choice Products Pre-Lit Sparse Christmas Tree w 2-in-1 LEDs'
  - Name='Haute Decor Berkley Fir Tree'
  - Name='Puleo International 7.5-ft. Pre-Lit Natural Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company North Valley Spruce Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 7.5 ft. Natural Fraser Medium Fir Tree with Clear Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 9ft.'
  - Name='3ft Pre-Lit Dunhill Fir Artificial Christmas Tree Warm White LED Lights By National Tree Company'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 4' Alpine Artificial Christmas Tree with 100 Lights and 260 Bendable Branches'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Twillery Co. Artificial Slim Douglas Fir Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different brand and slim profile suggests a different silhouette; both Douglas Fir but likely less full and different branch technology.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill BH Balsam Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different brand and fir species (Balsam vs. Douglas) but similar function as a pre-lit artificial fir tree with realistic appearance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 6.5-ft. Pre-Lit Downswept Douglas Fir Pencil Slim Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and Downswept Douglas Fir designation, same height, pre-lit; pencil slim shape differs from full bodied but still closely related.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 4ft. Pre-Lit Artificial White Birch Tree with 180 Warm White LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different tree species (Birch) and much shorter height; different silhouette and branch construction from Douglas Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill European Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: European Fir species, different brand, but same general category of pre-lit fir tree; different branch tip technology likely.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 6.5' Pre-Lit Full Buffalo Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar height and full fir type; different brand and fir species but similar construction and pre-lit features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Carolina Pine Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand but different tree type (pine vs fir) with likely different needle and branch construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Slim Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and fir species but slim silhouette and different model name versus Downswept Douglas Fir full bodied tree.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 7 ft.
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, Dunhill fir type, similar but slightly smaller size and different model with likely different branch construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Vickerman 5' x 34" Dakota Alpine Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different brand and alpine fir species, smaller size and likely different branch style and fullness.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Best Choice Products Pre-Lit Flocked Artificial Aspen Noble Fir Christmas Tree w Branch Tips
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different brand but artificial fir tree with branch tips and pre-lit; addition of flocking differentiates appearance and texture slightly.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 12 Pre-lit Downswept Douglas Fir Pencil Slim Artificial Christmas Tree with Co
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, Downswept Douglas Fir, pre-lit, pencil slim shape; very similar but slimmer profile than full tree.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Majestic Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and fir species category, 'Majestic' may indicate full bodied similar to Downswept but not stated if pre-lit or downswept style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 8' Flocked Montana Down Swept Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree with Pinecones and 500 LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different brand and spruces species, larger size and flocked texture; downswept style is a similarity but otherwise different branch and needle construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Best Choice Products Pre-Lit Sparse Christmas Tree w 2-in-1 LEDs
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different brand, sparse silhouette suggests less full tree, likely different branch construction and needle type.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Haute Decor Berkley Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different brand but similar artificial fir tree category; details on lights or branch type not specified, likely average relevance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International 7.5-ft. Pre-Lit Natural Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different brand but pre-lit fir tree with natural appearance; size close but no downswept or specific branch tip technology mentioned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company North Valley Spruce Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand but spruce species with different needle and branch characteristics; likely less similar feel and silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 7.5 ft. Natural Fraser Medium Fir Tree with Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, pre-lit medium Fraser Fir tree with clear lights; different fir species and medium size but functionally similar.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 9ft.
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, Dunhill fir model but taller size; different branch design and silhouette from Downswept Douglas Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 3ft Pre-Lit Dunhill Fir Artificial Christmas Tree Warm White LED Lights By National Tree Company
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and Dunhill fir type but much smaller size; similar pre-lit feature but less similar in presence and fullness.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 4' Alpine Artificial Christmas Tree with 100 Lights and 260 Bendable Branches
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different brand, alpine tree species, smaller size with many bendable branches but different needle type and silhouette from a downswept Douglas Fir.
